T02D2563:24b-0: @24b * // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2563:24b-1: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'bras
T02D2563:24b-2: bu ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa bzhi bsgom
T02D2563:24b-3: pa ni / gong gi snying ga'i zla ba dang
T02D2563:24b-4: rdo rje'i aa de las 'jig rten gyi khams khengs
T02D2563:24b-5: par byed pa'i 'od zer kha dog dkar po byung
T02D2563:24b-6: ba des sems can thams cad la reg pa dang
T02D2563:24b-7: sdug bsngal dang bral nas bde ba dang ldan pa
T02D2563:24b-8: pa ni / dang / bde ba la yun ring bar gnas pa dang /
T02D2563:24b-9: chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don du yun ring du bsgom mo //
T02D2563:24b-10: 'od zer de'i phung po slar snying gar thim par bya'o //
